lines: 1. Amang'an 'amay' as' omogendi,'Yotayayete korwa nka;Omotoria mbwang'arairan'ense,N'obonda bwaye boche.
Ngoch' are, Mbwang'arairan'ens' eye;Namanya nairane bwango,N'abagendi bonsi, baegw'obonene,'Ker' Omotori'aragambe.
2. Chimber'as' abachenu baraire,Nachimanorwe kegima;Baria bonsi baraire mbaboke,'Rio naende bamenye.
3. Ntoumeran' as'enka y'omogoko,Toter' ogotoreka;Korwa chinsinyo chionsi chi'ense'eye,Tomosasim' Omogambi.
4. Haleluya amen Haleluya nabo,Gatoregene ntoike nka;Tosabe mono torendete,Ntobek'egutw'enyia.
